name: @wolframkriesing/spaish
description: SPAish - progressive enhancer for your MPA, make it feel SPAish

scripts.deploy: npm run build && git clone --branch=pages `git remote get-url origin` _deploy 2>/dev/null; cd _deploy && git pull && cp -r ../_dist/* . && git add --all . && git commit -m "Deployed - `date`";

author: Wolfram Kriesing
